review: Easy setup,super fast.Traded a roku box in for the fire tv.Not quite as many apps as the roku ,but I am not missing any movies or tv shows because of having less apps.Have cut off my satellite box and have been watching tv shows commercial free.I still have a rooftop antenna and am getting the rest of the main networks free from USTVNOW which I have installed on the fire tv.The fire tv just works faster and smoother than the ROKU and it also has an optical connection.

review: I loved this Fire TV right out of the box. You can be set up in minutes, download the apps and  and logged into your services like Netflix & Hulu Plus. The voice control works exactly as you would hope.I loved the Fire TV until I realize I am continuously disappointed in whatever operational problem it experiences with Hulu Plus. The video will play and then intermittently freeze. It is not my super-fast internet speed as Netflix runs absolutely perfect as does YouTube, or the location of the box as it is not running on wifi, it's hardwired. Using NBC as an example, the NBC intro and commercials all run flawlessly. But when my show starts to play, sometimes only the NBC watermark and the audio come through, while a video frame is frozen on the screen, or the screen is just black with only the audio playing. Extremely frustrating.I would otherwise five the Amazon Fire TV 5 stars, but not functioning properly with Hulu Plus (as advertised compatible app for the Fire TV) which is one of the top 3 most major services for those of us who dissed cable, forces me to unfortunately lower my rating. I will be trying a Roku box to see what happens and update my review after testing.
